entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.0°C

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening then becoming west 30 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
